SamPy.astronomy.stellarMFs.mstar_bell¶

SamPy.astronomy.stellarMFs.mstar_bell(h=0.7, chabrier=True)¶
Warning :Data are missing??

Stellar mass function from bell et al. (H0=100). Convert to Chabrier IMF.
